question_stem: An urn has n white and m black balls. Balls are randomly withdrawn without replacement, one at a time, until a total of k white balls have been withdrawn, where k ≤ n. The random variable X is the total number of balls that have been withdrawn. What is the support of X?
question_stem_html: An urn has n white and m black balls. Balls are randomly withdrawn without replacement, one at a time, until a total of k white balls have been withdrawn, where k ≤ n. The random variable X is the total number of balls that have been withdrawn. What is the support of X?

items.part_stem: What is the support of X?
